Data Fields
EDMA_paramConfig_t_ Struct Reference

Param configuration typically used for stand-alone param sets (param sets not associated with any of the 64 DMA channels) such as for QDMA channels or for linking purposes. More...

#include <drivers/edma/edma.h>

Data Fields

EDMA_paramSetConfig_t paramSetConfig
 configuration of the PaRAM set.
 
EDMA_transferCompletionCallbackFxn_t transferCompletionCallbackFxn
 call back function for intermediate or final transfer completion depending on configuration of interrupt related flags in paramSetConfig if NULL, it is assumed that the intent of the user is to poll for the completion of the transfer using EDMA_isTransferComplete.
 
uintptr_t transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg
 argument to be returned by the call back function transferCompletionCallbackFxn.
 

Detailed Description

Param configuration typically used for stand-alone param sets (param sets not associated with any of the 64 DMA channels) such as for QDMA channels or for linking purposes.
